Package de.aicard.domains.learnset

Class LearnSetAbo

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.domains.BaseEntity
de.aicard.domains.learnset.LearnSetAbo
@Entity
public class LearnSetAbo
extends BaseEntity
Provides a LearnSet with further, account-specific information and is thus always embedded into an account. The further information provided by the LearnSetAbo are an ArrayList of CardStatus to safe the state of learning of the user for all the Cards in the LearnSet, the LearnSet itself and the evaluation the Account has given the LearnSet. primary place to save learnsets
Author:
Daniel Michel

  • Field Details

    • cardStatus

      private java.util.List<CardStatus> cardStatus
      The member-variable ardStatus is an ArrayList of CardStatus. It contains a CardStatus for each Card in the LearnSet m_learnSet.

    • learnSet

      private LearnSet learnSet
      The LearnSet the Account subscribed to.

    • evaluation

      private int evaluation
      The evaluation the Account has given to the LearnSet. If the Account has not yet given an evaluation to the LearnSet, the variable m_evaluation has the value -1.

      is redundant because evaluation is calculated on the fly by calculating averages of comment recomondations

    • learningSession

      private LearningSession learningSession

  • Constructor Details

    • LearnSetAbo

      public LearnSetAbo​(LearnSet learnSet) throws java.lang.Exception
      Constructor of the LearnSetAbo
      Parameters:
      learnSet - The LearnSet to which the Account subscribes.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

  • Method Details

    • getCardStatusOfKnowledgeLevel

      private java.util.List<CardStatus> getCardStatusOfKnowledgeLevel​(CardKnowledgeLevel level)
      Method to get all Cards of the LearnSet with a specific CardKnowledgeLevel.

      Checks the KnowLedgeLevel of all Cards in the List. Puts the CardStatus with the wanted level in a new ArrayList of CardStatus. Returns this List.

      Parameters:
      level - The CardKnowledgeLevel we are looking for
      Returns:
      A List of all CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo with the CardKnowledgeLevel level

    • createCardStatusListForSession

      private java.util.List<CardStatus> createCardStatusListForSession​(int numOfCards)
      Creates an ArrayList of CardStatus with a specific Number of Cards.

      Checks the CardStatus List of the Abo for one CardKnowledgeLevel after another (lowest level first) and fills a new ArrayList of CardStatus with the CardStatus of the lowest level, until there are as many CardStatus in the List as wanted.

      Parameters:
      numOfCards - The number of CardStatus we want in the returned ArrayList.
      Returns:
      List of the size _numOfCards, consists of the CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo with the lowest CardKnowledgeLevel.

    • createLearningSession

      public LearningSession createLearningSession​(int numOfCards)
      Creates a LearningSession with a specific number of Cards.

      First, it gets a List of the CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo of the lowest CardKnowledgeLevel. Then, it constructs a LearnSet of this CardStatus ArrayList.

      Parameters:
      numOfCards - how many Cards should be asked for in the LearningSession
      Returns:
      The created LearningSession.

    • removeCardStatusByCard

      public CardStatus removeCardStatusByCard​(Card card)
      removes a cardStatus with the given card from the cardStatusList
      Parameters:
      card - /
      Returns:
      CardStatus which is removed to be deleted
